00007 template<bool condition> struct boundary_check { };
00008 template<> struct boundary_check<true>  { static void f () { } };
00009 template<>struct boundary_check<false> { static void f () {
00010   throw std::out_of_range (std::string ("index out of bounds")); }
00011 };
00012 
00013 template<unsigned D, typename num = double>
00014 class vec {
00015 
00016 public:
00017   template<unsigned i>
00018   struct Access {
00019     static num access (num *data_) { return data_[i]; }
00020     static num checked_access (num *data_) {
00021       boundary_check<(i < D)>::f ();
00022       return access (data_);
00023     }
00024     static num access (vec<D> vec) { return vec[i]; }
00025     static num checked_access (vec<D> vec) {  
00026       return checked_access (vec.data_);
00027     }
00028   };
00029   
00030 public:
00031   static num dot (num *a, num *b) {
00032     return a[D-1]*b[D-1]+vec<D-1, num>::dot (a, b);
00033   }
00034   static num norm (num *a) {
00035     return dot (a, a);
00036   }
00037   static num abs (num *a) {
00038     return sqrt (norm (a));
00039   }  
00040   static void scalar (num *a, num s) {
00041     a[D-1] *= s;
00042     vec<D-1, num>::scalar (a, s);
00043   }
00044   static void normalize (num *a) {
00045     scalar (a, 1./abs (a));
00046   }
00047   vec (bool random = false): data_ (new num [D]) {
00048     for (int i = 0; i < D; i++) data_[i] = random? num (rand ())/RAND_MAX: 0;
00049     if (!random) data_[0] = 1;
00050   }
00051   num dot (vec<D, num> b) { return dot (data_, b.data_); }
00052   num norm () { return norm (data_); }
00053   num abs () { return abs (data_); }
00054   void scalar (num s) { scalar (data_, s); }
00055   void normalize () {return normalize (data_); }
00056 
00057   num &operator[] (unsigned i) { return data_[i]; }
00058   num  operator[] (unsigned i) const { return data_[i]; }
00059 
00060   num &at (unsigned i) {
00061     if (i >= D) throw std::out_of_range (std::string ("index out of bounds"));
00062     return data_[i];
00063   }
00064   template <unsigned i> num  at () const {
00065     if (i >= D) throw std::out_of_range (std::string ("index out of bounds"));
00066     return data_[i];
00067   }
00068   
00069   void print () {
00070     std::cout << "< ";
00071     std::copy (data_, data_+D-1, std::ostream_iterator<num>(std::cout, ", "));
00072     std::cout << data_[D-1] << " >" << std::endl; 
00073   }
00074   
00075   static bool is_vec () { return true; }
00076   static unsigned dimension () { return D; }
00077 private:
00078   num *data_;
00079 };
